All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ChannelClient
A client for interacting with channels in the Harmonia system.
ChannelPO
A class representing a channel in a server.
CommunitiesController
 
DirectMessageClient
A client class for accessing the Direct Message endpoints of the Harmonia API.
DirectMessagesController
The DirectMessagesController class is responsible for controlling the user's interactions with the chat view in the Harmonia application.
DMessagePO
 
HarmoniaApplication
Class representing the running class of the Harmonia application.
HarmoniaConstants
This class contains all the constants used in the Harmonia application.
HarmoniaController
Class representing the main controller of the Harmonia's main view
HarmoniaData
The HarmoniaData class contains constants and data used throughout the Harmonia application.
HarmoniaDataLoader
This class contains methods to load user data, load direct messages between users, and interact with direct messages.
HarmoniaMessagesConstants
 
HarmoniaTaskRefresher
 
HarmoniaUtils
A utility class containing static methods that can be used across the application.
HarmoniaViewsConstants
The HarmoniaViewsConstants class contains constants for the FXML view files used in the Harmonia application.
LoginController
Controller class for the login view.
MainViewController
 
MessagePO
A class representing a message exchanged between two users.
MessagesListView
 
ProfileController
This class extends MainViewController to control the user profile page.
PublicMessageClient
This class provides a client to interact with the public message API of the Harmonia application.
PublicMessagePO
A class representing a public message posted in a channel.
RegistrationController
The RegistrationController class manages the user registration process by handling user inputs, validating them, and sending them to the server through the UserClient class.
ServerClient
This class provides methods for retrieving information about servers using the Harmonia REST API.
ServerController
 
ServerMemberClient
The ServerMemberClient class is responsible for handling HTTP requests related to server members.
ServerMemberPO
A class representing a member of a server in Harmonia.
ServerPO
This class represents a server entity in the application.
SettingsController
Controller class for the Settings view.
UserClient
This class provides a client implementation to interact with the Harmonia user service API.
UserPO
This class represents a user entity in the application.
UsersListView
